stories.headline: IRS Tactics Against Meta Open a New Front in the Corporate Tax Fight
The Missing Semester of Your CS Education – Revised for 2026
Show HN: enveil – hide your .env secrets from prAIng eyes
Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
stories.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

stories.headline: Show HN: Steerling-8B, a language model that can explain any token it generates
OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners
stories.summary: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

stories.headline: Making Wolfram tech available as a foundation tool for LLM systems
Our First Proof submissions
stories.summary: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

stories.headline: Firefox 148 Launches with AI Kill Switch Feature and More Enhancements
Advancing independent research on AI alignment
stories.summary: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

stories.headline: Introducing OpenAI for India
stories.summary: OpenAI for India expands AI access across the country—building local infrastructure, powering enterprises, and advancing workforce skills.

stories.headline: Meta strikes up to $100B AMD chip deal as it chases ‘personal superintelligence’
stories.summary: Meta is buying billions of dollars in AMD AI chips in a multiyear deal tied to a 160 million-share warrant, deepening its push to diversify beyond Nvidia and expand data center capacity.

stories.headline: Oura launches a proprietary AI model focused on women’s health
stories.summary: The model supports questions spanning the full reproductive health spectrum, from early menstrual cycles through menopause.

stories.headline: Anthropic launches new push for enterprise agents with plugins for finance, engineering, and design
stories.summary: It's a major opportunity to grow Anthropic’s enterprise client base — and a significant threat to SaaS products currently performing those functions.

stories.headline: Mogul says it has tracked $1.5B in music royalties, raised $5M in funding
stories.summary: Mogul, which helps artists track royalties and value their catalogs, raised $5 million in a round led by the Yamaha Music Innovations Fund.

stories.headline: New Relic launches new AI agent platform and OpenTelemetry tools
stories.summary: New Relic is giving enterprises more observability tools, letting them create and manage AI agents, and better integrate OTel data streams.
